Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides that members of the legislature shall not serve more than five two-year terms in either house
Summary: Provides that members of the legislature shall not serve more than five two-year terms in either house; regardless of terms, service is limited to ten years in each house and no more than twenty years of service, in the aggregate, as a state legislator.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to term limits for legislators
